definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: In 2007, the state began to establish disaster-reduction demonstration communities.
sentences.chinese: 2007年，國家開展了減災示範社區創建活動。

sentences.english: Fourth, we should further strengthen cooperation in disaster prevention and mitigation, and post-disaster reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 第四，進一步加強防災減災和災後重建合作。

sentences.english: Formulate disaster prevention and mitigation plans and strengthen disaster monitoring and early warning.
sentences.chinese: 制定完善防災減災預案，加強災害監測預警。

sentences.english: Fourth, we completely revised the Law on Protecting Against and Mitigating Earthquake Disasters.
sentences.chinese: 四是全面修訂防震減災法。

sentences.english: Incorporating disaster reduction into the national education system.
sentences.chinese: 把減災納入國民教育體系。

sentences.english: Before the arrival of the flood season, everybody was ready to fight floods and reduce damage.
sentences.chinese: 在洪汛期到來之前，大家早已做好了抗澇減災準備。

sentences.english: Revision of the plans for protecting against and mitigating earthquake disasters shall be submitted for approval to the authorities that originally approved them.
sentences.chinese: 修改防震減災規劃，應當報經原批准機關批准。

sentences.english: One-hundred thousand Japanese troops are now involved in rescue and relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 十萬名日本自衛隊員正參與到救援減災行動中。

sentences.english: Thus the system can provide an auxiliary policy decision for enterprises to co…
sentences.chinese: 爲企事業單位抗震減災對策進行輔助決策。

sentences.english: We will continue to make earnest effort to strengthen disaster prevention and mitigation.
sentences.chinese: 我們要繼續紮紮實實加強防災減災工作。

sentences.english: Education of disaster prevention and reduction personnel are incorporated into the national talent development program.
sentences.chinese: 減災的國民教育體系和減災的培訓平臺逐步建立。

sentences.english: Education of disaster prevention and reduction personnel are incorporated into the national talent development program.
sentences.chinese: 減災的國民教育體系和減災的培訓平臺逐步建立。

sentences.english: The result demonstrates that the landslide risk mapping can be as a decision-making tool in dealing with landslide problems.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，滑坡風險圖可作爲滑坡減災決策的依據。

sentences.english: City prevent flood to reduce calamity will rely on scientific city more to prevent flood to plan.
sentences.chinese: 城市防洪減災將更加依賴於科學的城市防洪規劃。

sentences.english: As life-line engineering projects, bridges play a paramount important function in modern society.
sentences.chinese: 作爲生命線工程的橋樑，在抗震減災中具有重要作用。

sentences.english: A national education system and a training platform for disaster reduction have been gradually established.
sentences.chinese: 減災的國民教育體系和減災的培訓平臺逐步建立。

definition: full-time/to appoint sb to a specific task
to confer/to consult/to negotiate/to hold a conference
